title: Url
description: URL object (can be implicitly casted to string)

host.description: hostname (e.g. `salesviewer.com`) _Note: `www.salesviwer.com` is an other host than `salesviewer.com`, maybe use `like(host, '%salesviwer.com')`_

pathQueryFragment.description: path, query and fragment of URL, e.g. `/api/?query=test#result`

pathQuery.description: path and query of URL, e.g. `/api/?query=test`

queryFragment.description: query and fragment of URL, e.g. `query=test#result`

fragment.description: query and fragment of URL, e.g. `result`
